name: Ping
headline: The global neo-bank for contractors and freelancers
description: Ping enables international contractors and freelancers to have access to a personal Dollar account in the US, a crypto account, and generate invoices to get paid.  With Ping, workers make on average 4% more money and get paid the same day.

founders.name: Mary Saracco, Founder
founders.description:
My goal is to revolutionize international payments and make them as easy as sending an email.
I have previously worked at UBS as an M&A Investment Banker and at the World Bank before switching to applying my knowledge to work on cross-border payments full time.

Before Ping, my team and I created Latamex,  LatAm's largest fiat-to-crypto gateway, providing services to top exchanges like Binance, OKEX, Huobi and blockchains such as Stellar, IOTA, amongst others.

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Ping**

Founded in 2021 and hailing from Buenos Aires, Argentina, Ping is a vibrant neo-bank tailored specifically for contractors and freelancers navigating the complexities of international payments. As part of the Y Combinator Batch S22, Ping’s mission is simple yet ambitious: to empower workers around the globe by providing accessible financial tools.

**What Does Ping Offer?**

At its core, Ping offers international contractors and freelancers a personal US dollar bank account and a cryptocurrency account. This dual functionality allows users to send and receive payments seamlessly, helping them earn on average 4% more—often getting paid the same day they invoice.

**Key Features:**
- **Easy Account Setup:** Users can open a free US dollar account and a crypto account, enabling them to transact globally with minimal fuss. 
- **Invoicing Made Simple:** Create and send invoices securely, ensuring payments can flow in effortlessly.
- **Global Payment Options:** Users can store, transfer, convert, or withdraw their money in whichever currency they prefer—dollars or cryptocurrencies.
- **Instant Transactions:** Confirmed speed is a cornerstone, with workers able to withdraw their earnings in as little as ten minutes.
- **User-Centric Support:** With a team of 20 employees, Ping ensures support is readily available for all users.

**User Testimonials:**
Customers rave about the quick setup and handling of transactions, with many noting how Ping simplifies international finance for freelancers. Everyday expenses become manageable and transparent, allowing users to focus more on their work instead of their banking.

**Scalability and Future Vision:**
As the landscape of remote work expands, Ping's offerings are timely, positioning them at the intersection of fintech and the freelance economy. It has already made a splash by making sound partnerships and adopting cutting-edge solutions, ensuring it grows alongside its user base.

With Ping, freelancers no longer have to contend with the complexities of cross-border payments—they can simply focus on doing their best work. 

For more information, visit [Ping's website](https://www.letsping.com).
